events_to_add.title: Sistema de Entretenimiento Concert
events_to_add.description: Rock and alternative music concert featuring local band Sistema de Entretenimiento
events_to_add.location: Multiforo Sónica, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Tiamat Gothic Metal Concert
events_to_add.description: Gothic metal concert featuring Swedish band Tiamat
events_to_add.location: Bunker 57, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Festival de la Navidad Verde
events_to_add.description: City-wide Christmas celebration featuring choir performances, Christmas tree lighting at Plaza de los Fundadores, videomapping 'Regalo de Luz' at the Cathedral, nativity scene at Palacio de Gobierno, 'Villa del Carmen' Christmas concerts, and cultural activities throughout the historic center
events_to_add.location: Centro Histórico - Plaza de los Fundadores, Plaza del Carmen, Plaza de Aranzazú

events_to_add.title: Fiesta de la Luz - Sueño de Navidad
events_to_add.description: Spectacular videomapping projections on the Catedral Metropolitana in Plaza de Armas. San Luis Potosí pioneered this type of light and sound show in Mexico. Features 'Sueño de Navidad' (Christmas Dream) showcasing local traditions, Huasteca culture, and religious themes through luminous projections, music, and visual effects
events_to_add.location: Plaza de Armas, Catedral Metropolitana, Centro Histórico

events_to_add.title: Lucha Libre Dinastía Chávez Spectacular
events_to_add.description: Professional wrestling event at FENAPO venues featuring Alberto del Río 'El Patrón', Fishman, Dos Caras, and Dr. Wagner
events_to_add.location: Palenque FENAPO, Av. Francisco Martínez de la Vega 255

events_to_add.title: Dinastía Chávez Boxing Night
events_to_add.description: Professional boxing event featuring Julio César Chávez Jr. vs Ángel Julián and Omar Chávez vs José Miguel Torres. Major international boxing card presented by the State Government
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: C-KAN Hip-Hop Concert
events_to_add.description: Hip-hop and rap concert featuring Mexican artist C-KAN
events_to_add.location: Teatro de la Ciudad Tangamanga 1, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Feria de la Candelaria - Ahualulco
events_to_add.description: Patronal festival honoring the Virgin of Candelaria with traditional dances, religious processions, and regional fair activities
events_to_add.location: Ahualulco, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Alan Parsons Live Project
events_to_add.description: Progressive rock concert featuring legendary musician Alan Parsons and his live project band
events_to_add.location: Teatro de la Ciudad del Parque Tangamanga, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Festival del Pulque y el Mezcal - Mexquitic 2026
events_to_add.description: Annual festival celebrating pulque and mezcal traditions. Features mezcal tastings, pulque demonstrations, traditional gastronomy including enchiladas, tamales, tostada borracha, gorditas de camarón with pulque sauce, workshops, artisan market, cultural dances, and carnaval processions. Held in collaboration with 50 pulque-producing families
events_to_add.location: Mexquitic de Carmona - Plaza Cívica Damián Carmona, Jardín Hidalgo

events_to_add.title: Baile Sonidero del Día del Amor y la Amistad
events_to_add.description: Valentine's Day dance celebration featuring Sonido Pirata and sonideros from Mexico City and San Luis Potosí. Cumbia and sonidero music tradition
events_to_add.location: Teatro del Pueblo, FENAPO

events_to_add.title: Vamos Otra Vez Fest 2026
events_to_add.description: Rock and alternative music festival featuring Allison, Delux, Finde, Thermo, Say Ocean, Tolidos, Elli Noise, and Q69k
events_to_add.location: Teatro de la Ciudad del Parque Tangamanga, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: JUNTOS - La Máquina del Tiempo Tour 2026
events_to_add.description: Regional Mexican music concert featuring Jorge Medina and Josi Cuen performing banda music
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: El Malilla Urban Concert
events_to_add.description: Urban and reggaeton concert featuring El Malilla with Eme MalaFe and local talent
events_to_add.location: Teatro del Pueblo, FENAPO

events_to_add.title: 90s Pop Tour 'El Antro'
events_to_add.description: Major nostalgia pop tour featuring JNS, Kabah, Ari Boroboy, Erika Zaba, Kalimba, M'Balia, Magneto, Erik Rubín, Mercurio, The Sacados, Caló, SBS, and Le Twins
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Fiesta del Señor del Saucito
events_to_add.description: One of the most vibrant patronal celebrations in the state, featuring religious processions, traditional dances, music, food vendors, and community festivities
events_to_add.location: Barrio del Saucito, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Porter 'Rituales' Concert
events_to_add.description: Alternative and indie rock concert featuring Mexican band Porter on their 'Rituales' tour
events_to_add.location: San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Banda MS Concert
events_to_add.description: Major regional Mexican music concert featuring Banda MS de Sergio Lizárraga, one of Mexico's most popular banda sinaloense groups
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: El Trono de México Concert
events_to_add.description: Regional Mexican grupera music concert featuring El Trono de México
events_to_add.location: Palenque FENAPO, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Love of Lesbian Concert
events_to_add.description: Spanish indie pop/rock concert featuring Barcelona band Love of Lesbian
events_to_add.location: Teatro de la Paz, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Spring Equinox Celebrations
events_to_add.description: Various celebrations marking the arrival of spring, including flower exhibitions, traditional dances, music performances, and art installations throughout the city
events_to_add.location: Various parks and plazas, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Feria Nacional del Libro UASLP 2026 - 50th Edition
events_to_add.description: 50th anniversary edition of the National Book Fair organized by Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí. Features 120+ publishing houses, book presentations, author signings, literary conferences, and workshops. Milestone edition with expanded programming
events_to_add.location: Centro Cultural Universitario Bicentenario (CC200), UASLP

events_to_add.title: Viernes de Dolores - Altares a la Virgen de los Dolores
events_to_add.description: Traditional Friday before Palm Sunday celebration featuring altars to the Virgin of Sorrows displayed throughout homes and businesses in Callejón del Buche and historic center
events_to_add.location: Callejón del Buche, Centro Histórico, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Semana Santa - Palm Sunday Procession
events_to_add.description: Traditional Palm Sunday procession to the Cathedral for palm blessing, marking the beginning of Holy Week celebrations
events_to_add.location: Centro Histórico, Catedral Metropolitana, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Procesión del Silencio
events_to_add.description: The second-largest Holy Week procession in the world after Seville, Spain. Declared Cultural Heritage of San Luis Potosí. Over 2,500 participants from 30 cofradías (brotherhoods) march silently through the historic center carrying religious images representing the Stations of the Cross. Participants wear hooded tunics in various colors. Atmosphere filled with incense, candlelight, drums, and bugles – but no speaking. Approximately 100,000+ spectators attend
events_to_add.location: Centro Histórico - Templo del Carmen to Plaza de los Fundadores via San Agustín and San Francisco

events_to_add.title: Quema de Judas - Holy Saturday
events_to_add.description: Traditional 'Burning of Judas' celebration on Holy Saturday featuring the burning of Judas effigies, music, and community festivities
events_to_add.location: Plaza de Armas, Centro Histórico, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Copa Potosí de Futbol 2026
events_to_add.description: Major amateur soccer tournament with prize money exceeding 1 million pesos. Attracts former Liga MX players and international talent. San Luis Potosí's premier amateur soccer competition
events_to_add.location: Various venues, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Feria Nacional de la Huasteca Potosina (FENAHUAP) 2026
events_to_add.description: Major 10-day fair celebrating Huasteca culture with significant gastronomy pavilion featuring traditional dishes: zacahuil (giant tamal), bocoles, enchiladas huastecas, enchiladas potosinas, tamales de acuyo, caldo huasteco. Includes huapango music, artisan market, agricultural exhibition, folkloric dances, and concerts. Annual event since 1963
events_to_add.location: Ciudad Valles, Huasteca Potosina, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Feria Nacional de la Enchilada (FENAE) 2026
events_to_add.description: Premier enchilada festival with 200+ years of tradition. Features 50+ exhibitors showcasing enchilada varieties from across Mexico: potosinas, huastecas, rioverdenses, maicenses, mexicanas, mineras, suizas. Innovative dishes, free concerts, circus, mechanical rides, artisan market, and 'Carrera de la Enchilada' athletic race. Previous editions attracted 500,000+ visitors
events_to_add.location: Plaza Principal, Soledad de Graciano Sánchez

events_to_add.title: Festival Mexcal 2026
events_to_add.description: Major mezcal celebration featuring mezcals from various regions of Mexico, traditional gastronomy, live music, artisan vendors, and children's activities. Various ticket tiers including exclusive mezcal tastings. Attracts 2,000-3,000 attendees
events_to_add.location: Ecomuseo del Parque Tangamanga I, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Raúl Alcalá Challenge Gran Fondo
events_to_add.description: Major road cycling event named after Mexican cycling icon Raúl Alcalá. Part of San Luis Potosí's positioning as a cycling destination
events_to_add.location: Parque de Morales, Delegación de Bocas, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: San Luis Metal Fest 2026
events_to_add.description: Inaugural international two-day metal festival organized by SierraCentro Producciones and Medussa Entertainment. Features 10+ international bands plus national and local acts. Designed to attract visitors from Mexico, Latin America, and Europe
events_to_add.location: FENAPO grounds - Teatro del Pueblo, Palenque, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Gutalax Grindcore Concert
events_to_add.description: Grindcore and metal concert featuring Czech band Gutalax
events_to_add.location: Club Deportivo 2000, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: La Gira de Despedida del Hijo del Santo
events_to_add.description: Farewell wrestling tour of legendary Mexican luchador El Hijo del Santo. Major lucha libre event celebrating the career of a wrestling icon
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Festival Internacional del Vino 2026 - 14th Edition
events_to_add.description: Major enogastronomic event featuring 500+ wine labels from Mexico and internationally. Includes mezcal tasting zone, craft beer fest zone, premium wine tastings led by renowned enologists, Argentine asado dining experience, gastronomic zone with top SLP chefs, picnic area, live music (flamenco, tango, salsa), art exhibitions, and wine conferences
events_to_add.location: Centro de las Artes de San Luis Potosí (CEART), Centro Histórico

events_to_add.title: Infomatrix 2026 - Concurso Iberoamericano de Ciencia y Tecnología
events_to_add.description: International technology and innovation competition bringing together young talents from 9 Iberoamerican countries and 26 Mexican states. Categories include robotics, digital animation, sustainability, app development, and AI. First time held in San Luis Potosí
events_to_add.location: Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus San Luis Potosí - Arena Borregos

events_to_add.title: BMW Maratón Internacional Tangamanga 2026 - 40th Edition
events_to_add.description: One of Mexico's oldest road running events (since 1983), AIMS member and Boston Marathon qualifier. Features 5K, 10K, 21K (half marathon), and 42K (full marathon) distances. Flat route at average altitude of 1,860m passing through Tangamanga I Park, Centro Histórico, and Tangamanga II
events_to_add.location: Parque Tangamanga I & II, Centro Histórico, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Hobby Salsa Fest 2026
events_to_add.description: Salsa and Latin dance festival featuring workshops, performances, social dancing, and competitions
events_to_add.location: San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Liga MX Clausura 2026 - Atlético de San Luis Home Games
events_to_add.description: Professional first-division Mexican soccer matches. Atlético de San Luis plays approximately 8-9 home games during the Clausura tournament season
events_to_add.location: Estadio Alfonso Lastras, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Liga MX Apertura 2026 - Atlético de San Luis Home Games
events_to_add.description: Professional first-division Mexican soccer matches. Atlético de San Luis home games during the Apertura tournament season from July through November
events_to_add.location: Estadio Alfonso Lastras, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Festival de la Huasteca 2026
events_to_add.description: Cultural festival celebrating the Huasteca region's indigenous heritage through traditional music including huapango, dance, gastronomy, and crafts
events_to_add.location: Various municipalities in the Huasteca Potosina

events_to_add.title: FENAPO 2026 - Feria Nacional Potosina
events_to_add.description: The largest annual celebration in San Luis Potosí and one of Mexico's most important fairs with 83+ years of tradition. Features concerts at Teatro del Pueblo (free) and Palenque (paid), extensive gastronomy pavilion with traditional potosino dishes, Pabellón Industrial, Expo Comercial, amusement rides, artisan crafts, agricultural exposition, bullfighting, and entertainment. Attracts 9+ million visitors over approximately 24 days
events_to_add.location: Recinto Ferial FENAPO, Av. Francisco Martínez de la Vega 255, Col. Tepeyac

events_to_add.title: Copa Kama's de Futbol - FENAPO
events_to_add.description: Youth soccer tournament during FENAPO (Feria Nacional Potosina)
events_to_add.location: Unidad Deportiva Adolfo López Mateos, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Copa Maxibasquet Potosí - FENAPO
events_to_add.description: Veterans basketball tournament for 35+ age categories during FENAPO
events_to_add.location: CEDETAR and Auditorio de la Renovación Moral, Parque Tangamanga II

events_to_add.title: Fiesta de la Virgen de la Asunción - Santa María del Río
events_to_add.description: Colorful celebration honoring the Virgin of the Assumption in the famous silk rebozo-producing town. Features religious processions, traditional dances, artisan displays, and regional cuisine
events_to_add.location: Santa María del Río, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Ciclista San Luis Rey - FENAPO
events_to_add.description: Annual cycling event held in Tangamanga Park as part of FENAPO sports events
events_to_add.location: Parque Tangamanga I, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Torneo de Voleibol FENAPO-INPODE
events_to_add.description: Volleyball tournament during the National Fair organized by INPODE
events_to_add.location: CEDETAR (Centro de Desarrollo de Talentos y Alto Rendimiento), San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Fiesta Patronal de San Luis Rey de Francia
events_to_add.description: Celebration honoring the city's patron saint, Saint Louis King of France. Religious activities, traditional dances including Matachines, fireworks, and cultural events coinciding with the central days of FENAPO
events_to_add.location: Centro Histórico, Catedral Metropolitana, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Grand Prix de Atletismo FENAPO
events_to_add.description: Track and field athletics competition during FENAPO featuring local, state, and regional athletes
events_to_add.location: CEDETAR, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Copa Tigre de Taekwondo - FENAPO
events_to_add.description: Martial arts taekwondo tournament during FENAPO. San Luis Potosí is known as a national taekwondo power
events_to_add.location: CEDETAR, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Serial Trail Mágico - Real de Catorce
events_to_add.description: Trail running race through the historic Pueblo Mágico of Real de Catorce. Part of the Serial Trail Mágico series featuring 3K, 5K, 10K, and 21K distances through scenic mountain trails
events_to_add.location: Real de Catorce, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Serial Trail Mágico - Xilitla
events_to_add.description: Trail running race through the surrealist gardens and jungle landscape of Xilitla Pueblo Mágico. Features nocturnal and daytime races with 3K, 5K, 10K, and 21K distances
events_to_add.location: Xilitla, Huasteca Potosina, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Serial Trail Mágico - Aquismón
events_to_add.description: Trail running race through the natural landscapes near Aquismón featuring waterfalls and Huasteca scenery. Part of the Serial Trail Mágico series
events_to_add.location: Aquismón, Huasteca Potosina, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Fiesta de San Francisco de Asís - Real de Catorce
events_to_add.description: One of the most important pilgrimages in Mexico. Devotees venerate 'Panchito' (San Francisco de Asís) in this historic mining town Pueblo Mágico. Features the lowering of the saint's image from its niche, processions, traditional dances, a week-long fair, and religious ceremonies. Approximately 100,000+ pilgrims attend
events_to_add.location: Real de Catorce, Parroquia de la Inmaculada Concepción

events_to_add.title: Fiesta de San Miguel Arcángel
events_to_add.description: Patronal celebration in Barrio de San Miguelito and Mexquitic de Carmona. Nine-day novena with processions, masses, traditional dances, and community festivities
events_to_add.location: Barrio de San Miguelito, San Luis Potosí; Mexquitic de Carmona

events_to_add.title: Oktobeerfest / Global Beer Fest 2026
events_to_add.description: Largest craft beer festival in San Luis Potosí since 2017. Features 50+ craft beer labels from across Mexico, mixology, gastronomic pavilion, artisan market, two music stages with live bands, comedy shows, and children's play area
events_to_add.location: Ecomuseo del Parque Tangamanga I, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: Medio Maratón UASLP 2026 - 42nd Edition
events_to_add.description: San Luis Potosí's largest and most traditional running race with 40+ years of history. World Athletics and FMAA certified. Features 21K, 10K, and 5K distances. Draws 12,500-17,000+ participants. Start/finish at Plaza de Fundadores
events_to_add.location: UASLP Edificio Central, Centro Histórico, Tangamanga I Park

events_to_add.title: Centro de las Artes - Museo Leonora Carrington
events_to_add.description: Ongoing exhibitions at the first museum in the world dedicated to surrealist artist Leonora Carrington, featuring 100+ works. Located in the historic former penitentiary converted to arts center. Regular exhibitions, workshops, and cultural programming
events_to_add.location: Centro de las Artes de San Luis Potosí, Calzada de Guadalupe 705

events_to_add.title: Teatro de la Paz Cultural Programming
events_to_add.description: Ongoing cultural programming at one of Mexico's four principal historic theaters (built 1889-1894). Hosts opera, theater, dance, concerts, and cultural events throughout the year. Features galleries and the Sala Germán Gedovius for exhibitions
events_to_add.location: Teatro de la Paz, Villerías 105, Plaza del Carmen, Centro Histórico

events_to_add.title: 6ta Carrera Atlética Juntos Avanzamos 2026
events_to_add.description: Important social-athletic event promoting disability inclusion. Features running distances with start/finish at Arena Potosí. Celebrates 30th anniversary of 'Juntos, una experiencia compartida A.C.' organization. Includes prize raffles
events_to_add.location: Arena Potosí, San Luis Potosí

events_to_add.title: NASCAR México Series - San Luis Potosí
events_to_add.description: Stock car racing series at Autódromo Potosino. Part of Latin America's most important NASCAR championship with multiple events throughout the season
events_to_add.location: Autódromo Potosino, Km 237 San Luis Potosí-Rioverde highway

events_to_add.title: TecnoMedic 2026 - International Medical Technology Congress
events_to_add.description: International medical technology congress connecting healthcare professionals with technology industry. Features 500+ suppliers expo, keynote conferences, B2B meetings, workshops, and networking events
events_to_add.location: Centro de Convenciones de San Luis Potosí, Boulevard Antonio Rocha Cordero 125

events_to_add.title: Feria de Proveeduría - 3rd Edition
events_to_add.description: Government-organized supplier development fair focused on industrial development. Features speakers on innovation, technology, linkage, development, and competitiveness. Free entry for visitors, exhibition opportunities for suppliers
events_to_add.location: Centro de Convenciones de San Luis Potosí, Blvd. Antonio Rocha Cordero 125
